description:
This short course is designed to help managers select the right person for the job. The course will run through each stage of the process from first of all deciding the type of person you want for the role, advertising, interviewing and then hiring.

The course is a mixture of videos, presentations and documents the learner can print off and read at home.

The course is designed to be completed in their own time and can be left and picked up at any point
title: Staff Recruitment
